summary: An internal FBI email from August 12, 2019, forwarding a situational report (Sitrep) regarding afternoon investigative activities surrounding Jeffrey Epstein. The email originates from a Supervisory Special Agent with the FBI New York Violent Crimes Task Force.

persons.name: Supervisory Special Agent FBI New York Violent Crimes Task Force
persons.context: The sender of the email, who is forwarding a situational report regarding investigative activities surrounding Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Epstein Investigative Activities Sitrep
events.description: Afternoon investigative activities surrounding Jeffrey Epstein are documented in a situational report (Sitrep) that is being forwarded via FBI internal email.
personsInvolved: Supervisory Special Agent FBI New York Violent Crimes Task Force

keyFacts: The document is an FBI internal email dated August 12, 2019, concerning investigative activities around Jeffrey Epstein.
A situational report (Sitrep) detailing afternoon investigative activities is attached to the email.
The email originates from a Supervisory Special Agent with the FBI New York Violent Crimes Task Force, based at 26 Federal Plaza in New York.
The email is heavily redacted, with most sender/recipient names and email addresses obscured.
